libs.deep_models.pose.monodepth2.monodepth2¶

class Monodepth2PoseNet(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: libs.deep_models.pose.deep_pose.DeepPose

This is the interface for Monodepth2 pose network

inference(imgs)[source]¶

Pose prediction

Parameters

imgs (tensor, Nx2CxHxW) – concatenated image pair

Returns

pose (tensor, [Nx4x4]) – relative pose from img2 to img1

inference_pose(img)[source]¶

Pose prediction

Parameters

imgs (tensor, Nx2CxHxW) – concatenated image pair

Returns

pose (tensor, [Nx4x4]) – relative pose from img2 to img1

initialize_network_model(weight_path, dataset, finetune)[source]¶

initialize network and load pretrained model

Parameters

  • weight_path (str) – directory stores pretrained models - pose_encoder.pth: encoder model; - pose.pth: pose decoder model

  • dataset (str) – dataset setup

  • finetune (bool) – finetune model on the run if True
